Question: What is your return policy?
Answer: Our return policy allows returns within 30 days of purchase.

Question: How can I track my order?
Answer: You can track your order using the tracking link in your email.

Question: What are your store hours?
Answer: Our store is open Monday through Friday, 9 AM to 9 PM.

Question: Do you offer international shipping?
Answer: Yes, we ship to most countries worldwide. Shipping rates may vary.

Question: Can I change my delivery address?
Answer: You can change your delivery address by contacting support before your order is shipped.

Question: How do I reset my password?
Answer: Click on 'Forgot Password' on the login page and follow the instructions.

Question: What payment methods do you accept?
Answer: We accept Visa, Mastercard, PayPal, and more.

Question: Where is your company located?
Answer: Our headquarters are located in San Francisco, California.

Question: Do you have a loyalty program?
Answer: Yes, join our loyalty program to earn points on every purchase.

Question: Is this product in stock?
Answer: Let me check the availability for you.

Question: How do I cancel my order?
Answer: You can cancel your order from your account if it hasn't been shipped yet.

Question: What is the warranty on this product?
Answer: This product comes with a one-year warranty.

Question: Do you have discounts for students?
Answer: Yes, we offer a 10% discount for students with a valid ID.

Question: Can I get a refund?
Answer: Refunds are processed within 5–7 business days after approval.

Question: Why is my order delayed?
Answer: Delays can happen due to high demand or carrier issues. Let me check your order.

Question: How do I contact customer support?
Answer: You can contact us via email at support@example.com or call 1-800-123-4567.

Question: What is your privacy policy?
Answer: Our privacy policy can be viewed at example.com/privacy.

Question: How do I unsubscribe from emails?
Answer: Click the 'Unsubscribe' link at the bottom of any email.

Question: Can I request a custom order?
Answer: Yes, custom orders are available for select products.

Question: Are there any upcoming promotions?
Answer: Stay tuned to our website for upcoming promotions and sales.

Question: Can I modify my order after placing it?
Answer: Once an order is placed, we cannot modify it, but you may cancel it within a short time frame before it is processed. Please contact support immediately for assistance.

Question: What is the status of my refund?
Answer: Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days after approval. If you have not received your refund after this period, please contact support for an update.

Question: Do you offer gift cards?
Answer: Yes, we offer gift cards in various denominations, which can be purchased on our website or in-store.

Question: Can I change the quantity of an item in my order?
Answer: If your order hasn't been processed yet, you can contact support to adjust the quantity of an item. Once the order is shipped, changes can no longer be made.

Question: Do you offer expedited shipping?
Answer: Yes, we offer expedited shipping options during checkout for faster delivery. The cost will depend on your location and the speed of delivery.

Question: How do I apply a promo code?
Answer: During checkout, you will find a field to enter your promo code. Simply type it in and click 'Apply' to see your discount reflected in the total.

Question: Can I ship to a P.O. Box?
Answer: Yes, we can ship to P.O. Boxes, though some carriers may not be able to deliver certain items to P.O. Boxes. Check the shipping details for specific items.

Question: Are your products eco-friendly?
Answer: Many of our products are designed with sustainability in mind. Look for the eco-friendly badge on product pages for more details.

Question: Can I gift wrap my order?
Answer: Yes, we offer gift wrapping for an additional fee. You can select this option during the checkout process.

Question: How do I leave a product review?
Answer: After receiving your order, you will be able to leave a review on the product page by selecting the 'Write a Review' button and sharing your feedback.

Question: What should I do if my item is damaged?
Answer: If your item arrives damaged, please contact support within 7 days of receiving your order, and we will assist you with a replacement or refund.

Question: Can I track an international order?
Answer: Yes, international orders can be tracked using the tracking number provided. Please note that tracking updates may take longer depending on the destination country.

Question: How can I get a copy of my receipt?
Answer: If you need a copy of your receipt, you can find it in your order history under your account, or contact support if you need further assistance.

Question: Do you offer price matching?
Answer: We offer price matching on identical items within 30 days of purchase. Please contact support for assistance if you find a lower price elsewhere.

Question: What is your policy on handling damaged or defective items?
Answer: If you receive a defective item, please contact customer support immediately. We will guide you through the process of returning or exchanging the item.

Question: Can I pre-order an out-of-stock item?
Answer: For select items, we offer pre-orders. If the item is available for pre-order, you’ll be able to place an order with an expected shipment date.

Question: How do I change my email address on my account?
Answer: You can change your email address by logging into your account and navigating to the 'Account Settings' page. If you need help, contact customer support.

Question: Do you offer a military discount?
Answer: Yes, we offer a 15% discount for military personnel with valid ID. You can apply this discount during checkout.
